---
labels: ['module']
description: 'Webpack dev server'
---

API:

Generate an instance of the Webpack dev server.

```ts
WebpackDevServer.from(options: WebpackDevServerOptions): EnvHandler<WebpackDevServer>
```

Generate an instance of the Webpack dev server when you already have the aspects.
```ts
WebpackDevServer create(
  options: WebpackDevServerOptions,
  aspectContext: WebpackDevServerAspectsContext
): WebpackDevServer
```
